item.description:
@Legacy07 wrote:

Loading please wait:

19 people have downloaded your client in total. and you posted this November 24th. Doubt you have a lot of people on.

We got new forums. If you wish to see them go to http://legacy07.com/forums/index.php#forum and also not everyone downloads client off of the forums.

@the_Ironman wrote:

Friendly bump for this outstanding server.

It may have it’s flaws, but the gameplay is well-worth delving yourself into if you enjoy a difficult economy.

Pikachu.

item.source: Legacy 07 - Highscores || Ironman Mode|| Wilderness Bosses || Zulrah || ACTIVE

item.title: Legacy 07 - Highscores || Ironman Mode|| Wilderness Bosses || Zulrah || ACTIVE
item.dc:creator: @Legacy07 Legacy07
item.description:
@Legacy07 wrote:

Bump. Here’s a recent patch log.

[code]- Fixed EXP Rates

  • Added spade, feathers, anti dfs, and rune ess to Iron Man shop.
  • Fixed Teleports
  • Removed unused files to help stability.
  • Fixed Alch prices for a better eco
  • Made there be only 500 of each Bloods, Astrals, Soul runes in Magic Shop.
  • Fixed fishing bug, you could fish without equip.
  • Disabled the rune ess for the time being. Added more ess to shops.
  • Moved Thief to home to help home population.
  • Removed thief stall 90 and switched the level 96 stall to 90.
  • Slayer master was moved because of thief to south of the bank.
  • Made donor boxes work, no more needing to assign donors, it is automatic.
  • Removed Chaos Altar spec effects due to a bug, will be reworked in the future.
  • Nerfed just a litte bit the boss npcs like kraken, wildy bosses, etc
  • Added new Achievement point items so now they are actually useful.
    [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Legacy 07 - Highscores || Ironman Mode|| Wilderness Bosses || Zulrah || ACTIVE
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You’ve shown only bosses and the usual list of content that a server would include, how about a little more that would compel some people to join? Like showing how smooth skilling might be, some PVP smoothness etc., and I would not recommend putting, “need staff” in the title. It only attracts the most stupid people in the world, you know?

Read full topic
